item.title: Dynamic user-controlled layout in a CMS
item.description: Thoughts on a way to create a layout, in a vein similar to the W3C's template-based positioning draft specification, but easier, in my opinion. [slnet0514:bb48c7ca-03dc-4d43-b35f-abcfa32b40be]

item.title: Found: 40 free HTML/CSS templates
item.description: Alessandro Fulciniti, along with an unnamed number of people, have create 40 CSS-based templates, free for download, available at http://blog.html.it/layoutgala/.
